creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Wide mouth with slightly flaring body on a tall foot rim; 2 separately attached monster head handles; 6 mythical animals (same design on each side) in low relief with 2 scrolling bands on a ring-punched ground
markings: [Yunjian Hu Wenming zhi (made by Hu Wenming of Yunjian)], incised and gilded, on bottom
title: Censer
